whoami.title: Who am I?
whoami.p1: I am a web developer passionate about creating innovative and intuitive digital experiences. With over 5 years of experience in the field, I combine technical expertise and design sensitivity to create standout web projects.
whoami.p2: My specialty is frontend development with React and Next.js, but I also master backend technologies and UI/UX design. I particularly enjoy exploring new technologies like WebGL and Three.js to create immersive web experiences.
whoami.p3: Outside of coding, I'm interested in digital art, virtual reality, and artificial intelligence. These passions fuel my creativity and help me design increasingly innovative web solutions.
